experience.title: Assurance Audit Intern
experience.description: As Assurance Audit Intern, I develop, implement, and maintain policies and procedures for a wide-ranging set of activities as well as I evangelize the transformation of business and operational outlook drove business strategies. My duties include: 	-Work with companies to improve business strategy and overcome existing challenges 	-Carry out and follow up audits to monitor management's interventions 	-Develop robust operational frameworks to support large initiatives to deliver necessary controls and critical metrics of growth, performance and profitability 	-Perform and control the full audit cycle including risk management and control management over operations' effectiveness, financial reliability and compliance with all applicable directives  	-Determine internal audit scope and develop annual plans.  	-Maintain open communication with management and audit committee
experience.description_html: As Assurance Audit Intern, I develop, implement, and maintain policies and procedures for a wide-ranging set of activities as well as I evangelize the transformation of business and operational outlook drove business strategies. My duties include: -Work with companies to improve business strategy and overcome existing challenges -Carry out and follow up audits to monitor management's interventions -Develop robust operational frameworks to support large initiatives to deliver necessary controls and critical metrics of growth, performance and profitability -Perform and control the full audit cycle including risk management and control management over operations' effectiveness, financial reliability and compliance with all applicable directives  -Determine internal audit scope and develop annual plans.  -Maintain open communication with management and audit committee

experience.title: Transformation Advisory Intern
experience.description: As Summer Intern, I reinforced seniors on different projects related to IT and Business consulting. Developed Job Descriptions and policies and procedures for clients as well as assisted the Business Consulting Team with organizational restructuring projects by preparing policies and procedures, department functions and assigning roles and responsibilitiesMoreover, I functioned with the Business Risk Services Team on Risk Management and Risk-Based Internal Audit projects. Prepared client proposals for the Business Consulting and Risk Management teams
